Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Game controller handles all game's operations:
updating positions, checking for collisions, handling switching levels,
draw the map according to different difficulty of the game, the text shown on the
screen and removing objects.

    • createGameLoop

      private void createGameLoop​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      CreateGameLoop for the animation timer. Every two seconds it will check to remove the
      temporary display text on the screen, and the temporary level text.
      Parameters:
      scene -
